Room.Name: Oceancrest Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Oceancrest Aveune, south of the Fighter's Academy.
Room.LongDescription: On the north side of the road, you can see Altihmin's Academy of Advanced Fighter Training, where advanced level fighters can go to receive superior training in hard-to-master fighting skills. Altihmin only accepts proven fighters and won't allow people who do not meet his strict criterion.
